snippet: The Rev. Shawn Ratigan was charged in 2011 after the police received a flash drive from his computer with hundreds of images of children.
abstract: Rev Shawn Ratigan, priest in Kansas City, Mo, area whose child pornography case led to misdemeanor conviction against Bishop Robert Finn, is sentenced to 50 years in federal prison; was charged in 2011 after police received flash drive from his computer with hundreds of images of children.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Shawn Ratigan was charged in 2011 after the police received a flash drive from his computer with hundreds of images of children.

headline.main: Missouri: Priest Gets 50 Years in Child Pornography Case
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Priest Gets 50 Years In Child Pornography Case
